snippet: After years of legal disputes, a new group of owners wants to revive CBGB with a summer festival and a new location.
abstract: Group of investors has bought the assets of the punk-rock club CBGB, which closed in 2006, and is planning an extensive summer music festival, to be held at venues around New York City, with an eye to reopening the club in a new downtown location.

byline.original: By JAMES C. McKINLEY Jr. and STEPHEN REX BROWN

lead_paragraph: After years of legal disputes, a new group of owners wants to revive CBGB with a summer festival and a new location.

headline.seo: CBGB Owners Plan a Festival and Seek a New Location
headline.main: CBGB Is Dead. Long Live CBGB.
headline.print_headline: CBGB Is Dead. Long Live CBGB.
